'''''Amon Hen'' 243''' is the two-hundred-and-forty-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in September [[2013]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[Radagast]] the Brown''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Artwork: ''[[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] and the spider''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Announcements
* Poem: ''Fangorn''
** By: Lin Pallett
* All Brân
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* Advert: [[Beyond Bree]] Calendar 2014
* Advert: ''Riddles by a J.R.R. Tolkien Fan''
* Report: Three Farthing Stone Smial Meeting
** By: Maggie Bailey
* Report: Czech Fantasy Festival 2013
** By: [[Alex Lewis]]
* Report: Laurelin Smial in Amsterdam
** By: Francesca Barbini
* Middle-earth Weekend
** By: Viv Wilkes
* Artwork: ''[[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]] and [[Rosie Cotton|Rosie]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: [[Alex Lewis]]
* Letters
* [[Christopher Tolkien]]'s comments in ''[[The Fall of Arthur]]''
** By: [[Jim Allan]]
* Letter from Queen Berúthiel
** By: Ruth Hunt
* Queen Berúthiel (the official version)
** By: Ruth Hunt
* Artwork: ''Skin changer''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* News From Fangorn
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Christopher's Clippings
** By: Christopher Kreuzer
* Artwork: ''Arthur''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Artwork: Untitled (cartoon)
** By: Ian Collier
* Committee
